title: stonehedge
author: stonehedge
content: Hi,I am a member of the GNY/LML core team. This is a courtesy announcement to holders of LML tokens.LML Tokens are being swapped for GNY tokens.The deadline for exchanging LML tokens for GNY tokens is 8th August 2023. After this date, the LML token will no longer be supported or developed by GNY.ioThe GNY coin supply is being reduced by 50% through a controlled burn process.LML holders will receive a bonus for swapping early.For further details and information on how to participate in the swap please visit https://www.gny.io/lml/If you have any difficulties with the swap, please raise a ticket on our service desk https://gny.freshdesk.com/support/homeYou can receive updates on the progress of the swap on Telegram https://t.me/GNYioBlockchain and Twitter https://twitter.com/gny_ioPLEASE BEWARE OF IMPOSTERS IN OUR TELEGRAM CHANNEL. No member of the core team will ever ask for access to your private keys or offer you tokens for sale.Thanks,Stonehedge / Dan Ames
